main_definition: Members refer to individuals who are part of a group, organization, or structure, often with specific roles or responsibilities.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Participants in an event or activity
meanings_and_examples.example: The members of the book club met every month to discuss their latest read.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals belonging to a team in sports or games
meanings_and_examples.example: Each football team has 11 players, and they are all considered vital members of their squad.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Members of a club or society with shared interests or goals
meanings_and_examples.example: The local photography enthusiasts' group is comprised of several members who regularly attend meetings to discuss techniques and share experiences.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals belonging to an organization, such as a company or association
meanings_and_examples.example: As part of the marketing department, each member has a specific role that contributes to the team's objectives.
